Desc.entry: Offers advocacy for people aged over 65 years experiencing some form of mental ill-health or learning disability. Advocates are specially trained and work with people on a one-to-one basis empowering them to make their own choices and speaking on their behalf if they are unable to do so for themselves, ensuring they have a voice and are not ignored or discriminated against. Also helps people to identify and access the services they need to enjoy the best possible quality of life. The service is tailored to the needs of the individual via support planning. Can meet in clients own home or in mutually convenient venues. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee 5207254.
